text: This is absolutely heartbreaking news. Please join me in praying for the children families and teachers affected by this horrific act of violence at Robb Elementary and the entire Uvalde community tonight.

The infant formula shortage has been devastating for families across Wisconsin. We need all hands on deck to get this product back on shelves.Last night I voted for critical legislation to address this crisis and help make sure it never happens again.
Happy Birthday @NatlHeadStart. Since 1965 #HeadStart has provided critical support to families and changed the lives of more than 37 million children nationwide. Thanks for all you do!
